"/ci2 1 Pati Begin":
"The pretty soldier of love and courage! It's Pati here!
Looook! Isn't this a cute bathing suit!"

"Pati the pretty soldier of love and courage cannot be defeated!
Alright, I'm going to enjoy the sea! "

"Eeeeek! I've failed!
There wasn't enough love or courage!"
"Oh……the pretty soldier that hasn't got enough love and courage needs a bit of a break…..ugh. "

"Tia!? …….damn you!
The pretty soldier of love, courage and sadness Pati is going to seek revenge! "

"/mn15 /toge /ci2 1 愛と勇気の美少女戦士！
パティちゃん、ここに参上！
みてー！　この水着かわいいでしょ！"

"/mn15 /ci2 1 愛と勇気の美少女戦士
パティちゃんに敵はなーい！
さあ、海を満喫するぞーっと！"

"/mn1 むきーっ！　失敗しちゃった！
愛と勇気が足りなかったからだー！"

"ああ……愛と勇気が足りなくなった
美少女戦士には、しばしの休息が

"/mn36 ティアっ！？　……おのれっ！
